message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $18,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. That's a bit high for my budget, I would be willing to pay $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is too low. Could you do $15,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. $15,000 is still a bit much - how about $11,500?
